articles.author: Eric W. Dolan
articles.title: Rare genetic variant shields brain from Alzheimer's disease - PsyPost
articles.description: Researchers discovered a genetic variant that reduces Alzheimer's disease risk by up to 70%, aiding in the removal of toxic amyloid from the brain. This highlights the role of the brain's blood vessels and suggests new therapeutic approaches.
articles.content: A groundbreaking study published in Acta Neuropathologica has identified a genetic variant that can reduce the risk of developing Alzheimers disease by up to 70%. This variant appears to help in remo… [+7035 chars]

articles.title: New study claims antidepressant withdrawal is less common than thought. But there's a big problem - PsyPost
